```{r}
# Attach packages
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)

# Read in Plantable Area data
plantable_county <- read.csv(here("Data", "1b_plantable_2018_county.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  rename(county = i_county)

```

### Task 1b. Plantable Area

```{r}

#---------------------------------------
# Plantable Area by county
#---------------------------------------

plantable_county <- ggplot(data = plantable_county, aes(x = county, y = area_acres)) +
  geom_col(fill = "seagreen4") +
  labs(x = "County", 
       y = "Acres",
       title = "Plantable Area by County") +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    text = element_text(family = "Times"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 14, family = "Times"),
    plot.title = element_text(size = 16, family = "Times")
    )

plantable_county

ggsave(here("Graphics", "1b_plantable_county.jpg"),plantable_county)

```
